text: @FLOTUS @SecondLady @POTUS How about advocating for the 120+K people who have died of COVID19 due to your husband's negligence? Today set the record for NEW cases. Advocate for all the Drs & Nurses who are being pushed to the limits! https://t.co/G7xylF7MdY
